name: braintrust-otel-examples
description: Examples for @braintrust/otel with OpenTelemetry v1.x and v2.x

scripts.v1:all: cd otel-v1 && npm install && npm run example:all
scripts.v2:all: cd otel-v2 && npm install && npm run example:all
scripts.install:all: npm run install:v1 && npm run install:v2
